property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {F2} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire 2 to summon this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card, then draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BUZZRENDER}(3) (When you pay this creature's cost, you may pay any number of additional (3). When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (3).) {BUZZRENDER}Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets +3000 power and "double breaker". (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this creature costs 3 less to summon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BUZZRENDER}(2) (When you pay this creature's cost, you may pay any number of additional (2). When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (2).) {BUZZRENDER}Your opponent chooses one of their creatures. Return that creature to your opponent's mana zone or hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {LW2} (You may pay Light/Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put it into your shields face up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {N1} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Nature 1 to summon this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. {OSHIOKIMOON}: Whenever a card leaves your shield zone, ignore this creature's ability to attack your opponent and this creature wins all battles until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose and tap one of your opponent's creatures. {ABARECHAIN}: Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if it's the first attack this turn, that creature gets +3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {VIVIDDRAW} {WF2} (During your turn, when you draw this creature before you attack, you may reveal it. If you do, you may pay Water/Fire 2 to summon this creature this turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Whenever you tap this creature using the "Mugen Climb" ability, draw a card.
